name: Ngozi Harrison
body:
## Hello Friend!

My name is Ngozi Harrison. I build ideas using technology for the purpose of improving life while also being socially responsible. I have always been fascinated by systems in the world and everyday I learn something new about how things work. I am particularly interested in Network Science, Economics and Finance, Data Analysis and Visualization, Graphic design, Urban Science and Mathematics.

#### You can find my main website at [ngozi.portfoliobox.me](ngozi.portfoliobox.me)
####You can also find me on Quora at [quora.com/ngozi-harrison](quora.com/ngozi-harrison)
####You can find me on LinkedIn at [Ngozi Harrison](linkedin.com/in/ngozi-harrison-abaa9b102)
